document_data.name: Fog Fever
document_data.mainbody: The '''Fog Fever''' was a [[disease]] outbreak that struck the [[Shoon Imperium]] in the {{YearlinkName|75}}.
document_data.Acquisition: The plague was contracted through the breathing in of a clinging fog that spread at night.
document_data.Effects: Afflicted individuals suffered from delusions and a raging, potentially fatal fever. If someone died of this fever, their last breath expelled more of the fog that spread the disease.
document_data.History: The Fog Fever spread to every city in the Shoon Imperium across both [[Calimshan]] and [[Tethyr]], and killed as much as 11% of the population. It struck major cities especially hard, notably [[Calimport]] (where the death toll reached 31%), [[Memnon]], and [[Myratma]].
